Which one of the following Fischer projections is of the monosaccharide <b>D-galactose</b>?	A. <table border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; border: white solid 0px;"><tbody><tr> <td colspan="2" style="border: solid white 0px; text-align: right;">H&nbsp;</td> <td colspan="2" style="border: solid white 0px;"></td> <td colspan="2" style="border: solid white 0px; Which one of the following Fischer projections is of the monosaccharide <b>D-talose</b>? Which one of the following Fischer projections is of the monosaccharide <b>L-altrose</b>? Which one of the following Fischer projections is of the monosaccharide <b>L-allose</b>? Which one of the following Fischer projections is of the monosaccharide <b>D-glucose</b>?	A. <table border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; border: white solid 0px;"><tbody><tr> <td colspan="2" style="border: solid white 0px; text-align: right;">H&nbsp;</td> <td colspan="2" style="border: solid white 0px;"></td> <td colspan="2" style="border: solid white 0px; Which one of the following Fischer projections is of the monosaccharide <b>D-mannose</b>? Which one of the following Fischer projections is of the monosaccharide <b>L-idose</b>? Which one of the following Fischer projections is of the monosaccharide <b>L-gulose</b>?
